name: Stones of Rome
description: James is trapped in the catacombs below Rome! Puzzle through 60 match-3 levels – underground and above – and reunite him with his tour group!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 / 8 / 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo processor or AMD Athlon™ 64 Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0a Storage: 250 MB available space
